pageDeck.heading: Sing Chan
paragraphs: I've spent over 25 years building user-friendly, visually engaging and accessible software. Whether standing up a UX development practice from scratch, leading product execution for a FedRAMP-certified platform, or cutting cloud hosting costs by 40%, I focus on making complex systems usable and delivering measurable results.
Below is a selection of projects where I served as UX Architect, Product Leader, or lead front-end developer.

meta.title: Product Manager & Full-Stack Developer | Sing Chan's Portfolio
meta.description: Explore portfolio projects from a creative technologist with 25+ years experience in product management, design, and full-stack development.
